Those locations — including spots in the Denver and Bay Area markets — have all closed since Amazon’s ...

t: Amazon.com: Allegro Coffee Decaf Organic Whole Foods Blend Whole Bean Coffee, 12 oz
s: Tried different decaf brands and this one is the best. I have to use a tad more to get the flavor right but overall am satisfied with this purchase. Plus it is organic and doesn’t use chemicals to process. The Allegro Whole Foods blend decaf is pretty awesome too and more robust for the morning. The Italian Roast seems a little smoother while being somewhat robust as well, depending on how much coffee ...
